mainText:
As a 63 year old retiree, I feel very blessed to have lived and witnessed the extraordinary era of Steve Jobs and his legacy at Apple Computer.

He had wisdom and vision that was unsurpassed, which touched people the world over.

The message he passed to the graduating class at Stanford University, "Find What You Love," was wonderful and inspiring.  And, it was just him.

Thank you Steve Jobs for all your gifts to us.

Not only a genius in the technoworld and business, but a wonderful human being.

God bless him as he rests in peace.
author: Bill
